knowledge_items.title: Technical Architecture Decision Framework
knowledge_items.content: For architecture decisions: 1) Define technical requirements and constraints, 2) Evaluate options using decision matrix, 3) Prototype critical paths, 4) Assess technical debt implications, 5) Consider team capabilities, 6) Document architecture decision records, 7) Review with CEO, CFO, COO. Key principles: Simplicity over complexity, Proven over bleeding-edge, Modular and loosely coupled, Security by design.
